Title: Kintsugi
Writer: Philip K. Dick (based on the book by), Frank Spotnitz (developed by), Francesca Gardiner, Joe Kawasaki (staff writer)
Actors: Alexa Davalos, Rupert Evans, Luke Kleintank, DJ Qualls
Plot: Nicole introduces Joe to an unexpected side of Berlin, that leads him down a new path. On her new mission, Juliana inserts herself into the Smith's inner circle. Tagomi is finally reunited ...
